page.title: 14FOOD AND EATING HABITS.
page.content: A random survey of eating habits revealed the following information. For the vast majority of people breakfast consists of a bowl of cereal or toast and a drink of tea, coffee or fruit juice. Very few people also have some form of cooked protein (sausage, bacon, egg). Most people have a mid-morning drink of tea or coffee. At lunch time everyone has a sandwich or snack, with few exceptions who had nothing .(NB. these were not those who had had a cooked breakfast) Everyone had a cooked evening meal comprising of some protein usually meat, potatoes and vegetables often followed by a sweet or pudding. Some people had tea, coffee, a soft or alcoholic drink later in the evening. Everyone seemed to eat the day's main meal at the table although other meals were often eaten in the kitchen.
